Articles.Content:
> 
> Where will the stream be posted so I can watch (yes this will be my first time watching a ksp live stream)

[http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv](http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv)

The stream automatically starts, so just leave it open.

- - - Updated - - -

OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOH the Kerbal twitter just said the stream in one hour also marks the point of the media release embargo. We maid instantly get some KSP videos at the top of the hour. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T17:04:00Z" title="04/25/2015 05:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Temeter**

Hi guys! I'm recently unemployed (or self-employed, whatever), so I'm going to go pitch a tent in the corner and play starcraft until Monday. I already have gone up 37 ranks, two days to go? Sigh...

\*Pitches tent and puts out hype signs, seats, and snacks\*

HYPE ON!!
Less than 1 hour!
32 minutes! Hype!

30 minutes left.

29

25
Awe man, I have to go to a performance soon so I'll miss the first round of streams. Still, HYPE ON!

19 minutes. Moar Danny to watch while I wait.

14

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T17:45:00Z" title="04/25/2015 05:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by K3achas**

I am the watching. Always watching. Waiting. Until, one day... I will see 1.0 preview streams. You will never relax for 20 minutes.

- - - Updated - - -

In 15 minutes I will strike. You have been warned.
We will be breaking the Plaid Factor 2 barrier in about 15 minutes.

What's the maximum Plaid Factor she's rated for?

11 minutes!

Happy landings!
11 minutes and then 2 days to acutally play the game...............
What about plaid-factor 4?
I will be waiting. In 10 minutes you will all be hyped. It is coming.

> 
> What about plaid-factor 4?

Oh I hope she's rated for faster than that. I expect we'll hit Plaid Factor 4 by this afternoon.

Happy landings!
8 minute HYYYYYPPPPPPPEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Can the hype-train even handle this much hype?

> 
> What's the maximum Plaid Factor she's rated for?
> 11 minutes!
> 
> Happy landings!

She's never been this fast. Upper limit assuming optimum levels on everyhting, probably Plaid Factor 6. That's on paper though. real-metaworld physics would never allow such speeds. Plaid Factor 5.2 at most.

EDIT:

**WE'VE BROKEN PLAID FACTOR 2!** Expect a small decrease in speed, then a faster accelleration! Get to KSPTV NOW!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T17:58:06Z" title="04/25/2015 05:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**

No, no it can't.

HHHHYYYYYYYPPPPEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T17:57:37Z" title="04/25/2015 05:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by \_jack**
I have had my revenge! HAHAHA! 1.0 HYPE TO THE MAX!
1 minute!
![sX6az5d.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sX6az5d.jpg)
Go away, ad. I banish thee!
Prepare for re-entry!
It's hypening
1 minute late for me.
